languages.text: Во множестве систем захватывали власть ересиархи и пиратские главари. Когда они не могли отыскать общего врага, они обращали оружие друг против друга, и Простор погружался во все более темные глубины кровавой анархии.

Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.
languages.original_text: Во множестве систем захватывали власть ересиархи и пиратские главари. Когда они не могли отыскать общего врага, они обращали оружие друг против друга, и Простор погружался во все более темные глубины кровавой анархии.

traits.locale_text: Power in many systems was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they couldn't find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into darker depths of bloody anarchy.

Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they couldn't find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

languages.text: 在无数星系中，异端与海盗领袖把握了大权。当这些人找不到共同的敌人时，就把武器对准了对方。由是，科罗努斯扩区陷入了更加黑暗、更加血腥的无政府状态。
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: 在无数星系中，异端与海盗领袖把握了大权。当这些人找不到共同的敌人时，就把武器对准了对方。由是，科罗努斯扩区陷入了更加黑暗、更加血腥的无政府状态。

languages.text: In vielen Systemen rissen Häresiarchen und Piratenbosse die Macht an sich. Wenn sie keinen gemeinsamen Feind finden konnten, richteten sie ihre Waffen aufeinander, und die Ausdehnung versank in noch dunkleren Tiefen blutiger Anarchie.
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: In vielen Systemen rissen Häresiarchen und Piratenbosse die Macht an sich. Wenn sie keinen gemeinsamen Feind finden konnten, richteten sie ihre Waffen aufeinander, und die Ausdehnung versank in noch dunkleren Tiefen blutiger Anarchie.

languages.text: Les hérésiarques et les chefs pirates s'emparèrent du pouvoir dans un grand nombre de systèmes. Incapables de se trouver un ennemi commun, ils s'entredéchirèrent et plongèrent les Étendues dans les affres plus ténébreuses que jamais d'une anarchie sanglante.
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: Les hérésiarques et les chefs pirates s'emparèrent du pouvoir dans un grand nombre de systèmes. Incapables de se trouver un ennemi commun, ils s’entredéchirèrent et plongèrent les Étendues dans les affres plus ténébreuses que jamais d'une anarchie sanglante.

languages.text: En muchos sistemas, los heresiarcas y los líderes piratas se hicieron con el poder. Cuando no encontraban un enemigo en común, se dedicaban a atacarse mutuamente, y la Extensión se sumió en las profundidades más negras de la anarquía sangrienta.
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: En muchos sistemas, los heresiarcas y los líderes piratas se hicieron con el poder. Cuando no encontraban un enemigo en común, se dedicaban a atacarse mutuamente, y la Extensión se sumió en las profundidades más negras de la anarquía sangrienta.

languages.text: いくつもの星系で、権力は異端者と海賊の首領の手に落ちていた。彼らは共通の敵を見いだせなければ、戦いの矛先を互いに向け合うことになる。エクスパンスでは血みどろの無政府状態のさらに暗い深みへと沈んでいった。
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: いくつもの星系で、権力は異端者と海賊の首領の手に落ちていた。彼らは共通の敵を見いだせなければ、戦いの矛先を互いに向け合うことになる。エクスパンスでは血みどろの無政府状態のさらに暗い深みへと沈んでいった。

languages.text: Birçok sistem, kâfirbaşı ve korsan kaptanlarınca ele geçirildi. Ancak ortak bir düşmanın yokluğunda silahlarını birbirlerine çevirdiler ve Enginlik, kanlı bir anarşiye battıkça battı.
languages.original_text: Across many systems, power was seized by heresiarchs and pirate leaders. When they failed to find a common enemy, they turned their weapons on each other, and the Expanse sank into even darker depths of bloody anarchy.

traits.locale_text: Birçok sistem, kâfir önderler ve korsan liderlerince ele geçirildi. Ortak bir düşman bulmayı başaramadıklarında silahlarını birbirlerine çevirdiler ve Enginlik, kanlı bir anarşinin gittikçe dibine battı.
